subject: Basketball (College)
NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
lead_paragraph: Karl-Anthony Towns will be the focal point of Kentucky’s effort to complete an undefeated season, and he will likely be one of the top two picks in the N.B.A. draft.
snippet: Karl-Anthony Towns will be the focal point of Kentucky’s effort to complete an undefeated season, and he will likely be one of the top two picks in the N.B.A. draft.
